nodes.text: Mobus, sometimes referred to as Sanctuary, was a gas giant in the Klasse Ephemora system of the Unknown Regions, orbiting Klasse Ephemora A.

Mobus had 18 moons, including M-3 and M-18. M-18 was actually the living planet Zonama Sekot. It had a gem mining station established over it that was abandoned around 25 BBY, due to atmospheric storms.
